- Integrated production chain including SMT workshop, molding, plastic injection, oil spraying, silk screen printing, and assembly line
- Passed ISO 13485 international quality management system, CE, RoHS, FDA certifications
- ODM service providing product ideation, R&D, testing, and manufacturing
- Professional inspection team ensuring 100% inspection of raw materials, semi-finished products, and finished products
- Equipped with professional testing machines for quality control
- Popular in North America, Europe, South-east Asia, Australia, and the Middle East
